mapper.insert:
SELECT port_seq.NEXTVAL no FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO port (no, title, content, writer, regdate, attachment, views) VALUES (#{no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, #{attachment}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT p.no, p.title, p.content, p.writer, p.regdate, p.attachment, u.v_id, u.v_name FROM userinfo u, port p WHERE p.writer = u.v_id ORDER BY p.no DESC
